00034 /*
00035  * Layout class
00036  *
00037  * - load a layout from disk if a layout was specified
00038  * - provide a default layout with basic graphs on the host tree if no layout
00039  *   was specified
00040  */
00041 require_once('class_vars.inc');
00042 require_once('class_graph.inc');
00043 require_once('class_text.inc');
00044 require_once('class_lexer.inc');
00045 require_once('setup.inc');
00046 require_once('tools.inc');
00047 
00048 class Layout {
00049     var $groups;
00050     var $groupvars;
00051 
00052     function Layout($name = '') {
00053         global $symon;
00054 
00055         $this->_reset();
00056 
00057         if ($name != '') {
00058             if (!isset($symon["layout_dir"])) {
00059             config_error("layout_dir", "is not set");
00060             return 0;
00061             }
00062             if (!is_dir($symon["layout_dir"])) {
00063             config_error("layout_dir", "does not point to a directory");
00064             return 0;
00065             }
00066 
00067                 if (isset($symon["isolate_hosts"]) &&
00068                     ($symon["isolate_hosts"] > 0) &&
00069                     is_dir($symon["host_tree"]."/".normalise_filename($name))) {
00070                     $this->_generate_host($name);
00071                 } else {
00072                     $this->_load($name);
00073                 }
00074         } else {
00075             $this->_generate_default();
00076         }
00077 
00078         if (!isset($this->groups)) {
00079             runtime_error('layout: no valid layout selected');
00080             return 0;
00081         }
00082     }
00083 
00084     function _generate_default() {
00085         global $symon;
00086 
00087         if (!is_dir($symon["host_tree"])) {
00088             config_error("host_tree", "does not point to a directory");
00089             return 0;
00090         }
00091 
00092         $root_dir = dir($symon["host_tree"]);
00093         while ($host = $root_dir->read()) {
00094                 $this->_generate_host($host);
00095             }
00096 
00097         if (!isset($this->groups)) {
00098             runtime_error('layout: need $symon["host_tree"]/hostname/cpu0.rrd like files to generate the default layout - none found.');
00099             return 0;
00100         }
00101     }
00102 
00103     function _generate_host($machine) {
00104         global $symon;
00105 
00106         if (!is_dir($symon["host_tree"])) {
00107             config_error("host_tree", "does not point to a directory");
00108             return 0;
00109         }
00110 
00111         if (is_file($symon["host_tree"]."/".$machine)) {
00112             runtime_error('$symon["host_tree"] should contain machine directories, not files. ($symon["host_tree"]/cpu0.rrd => $symon["host_tree"]/localhost/cpu0.rrd)');
00113         }
00114 
00115         if ($machine != '.' &&
00116             $machine != '..' &&
00117             is_dir($symon["host_tree"]."/".$machine)) {
00118             $groupvars = new Vars();
00119             $groupvars->set('host', $machine);
00120             $groupvars->set('dir', $symon["host_tree"].'/'.$machine);
00121             $groupvars->set('name', $machine);
00122             $this->_add_group($groupvars);
00123             /* get all graphs */
00124             $graph_dir = dir($symon["host_tree"].'/'.$machine);
00125             $files = array();
00126             while ($item = $graph_dir->read()) {
00127                 if ($item != '.' &&
00128                     $item != '..' &&
00129                     preg_match("/.rrd$/", $item)) {
00130                     $files[] = $item;
00131                 }
00132             }
00133             asort($files);
00134             /* get combined graphs */
00135             foreach ($symon['combine'] as $type => $enabled) {
00136                 if ($enabled) {
00137                     $combine = array();
00138                     $newfiles = array();
00139                     foreach ($files as $key => $item) {
00140                         if (preg_match("/^".$type."[0-9_]/", $item)) {
00141                             $combine[] = $item;
00142                         } else {
00143                             $newfiles[] = $item;
00144                         }
00145                     }
00146 
00147                     $files = $newfiles;
00148 
00149                     if (count($combine)) {
00150                         $v = new Vars();
00151                         foreach ($combine as $key => $item) {
00152                             $v->set('rrdfile'.$key, $symon["host_tree"].'/'.$machine.'/'.$item);
00153                         }
00154                         $g = new Graph($groupvars);
00155                         $g->set_graph_vars($v);
00156                         $this->_add_item($machine, $g);
00157                     }
00158                 }
00159             }
00160 
00161             foreach ($files as $key => $item) {
00162                 $v = new Vars();
00163                 $v->set('rrdfile', $symon["host_tree"].'/'.$machine.'/'.$item);
00164                 $g = new Graph($groupvars);
00165                 $g->set_graph_vars($v);
00166                 $this->_add_item($machine, $g);
00167             }
00168         }
00169     }
00170 
00171     function _add_group(&$vars) {
00172         if (strtolower(get_class($vars)) != 'vars') {
00173             print_r($vars);
00174             runtime_error('layout: internal: add_group(vars) - vars are not variables');
00175         }
00176 
00177         if (!$vars->defp('name')) {
00178             $this->_display();
00179             runtime_error('layout: need a valid group name for a group to add');
00180         }
00181 
00182         $name = $vars->get('name');
00183         if (isset($this->groupvars[$name])) {
00184             $this->_display();
00185             runtime_error("layout: group $name redefined");
00186         }
00187         $this->groupvars[$name] = $vars;
00188         $this->groups[$name] = array();
00189     }
00190 
00191     function _add_item($groupname, &$value) {
00192         if (!isset($this->groupvars[$groupname])) {
00193             $this->_display();
00194             runtime_error("layout: cannot add item $value : group $groupname has not been defined");
00195         }
00196         array_push($this->groups[$groupname], $value);
00197     }
00198 
00199     function _reset() {
00200         /* reset current layout */
00201         unset($this->groups);
00202         unset($this->groupvars);
00203     }
00204 
00205     function _load($name) {
00206         global $symon;
00207 
00208         if ($name == '' || $name == 'default' || $name == 'empty') {
00209             runtime_error('layout: need a valid layout name to load');
00210             return 0;
00211         }
00212 
00213         $name = normalise_filename($name);
00214         $file = $symon["layout_dir"].'/'.$name.'.layout';
00215 
00216         $lexer = new Lexer();
00217         $lexer->load($name);
00218         $groupvars = 0;
00219 
00220         $token = $lexer->next_token();
00221         do {
00222             if ($token === 0) {
00223             $token_string = '';
00224             } else {
00225             $token_string = $token;
00226             }
00227 
00228             switch ($token_string) {
00229             case 'group':
00230             $groupvars = new Vars();
00231             $groupvars->parse($lexer);
00232             $lexer->parse_semicolon();
00233             $this->_add_group($groupvars);
00234             $groupname = $groupvars->get('name');
00235             break;
00236 
00237             case 'graph':
00238             $graph = new Graph($groupvars);
00239             $graph->parse($lexer);
00240             $lexer->parse_semicolon();
00241             $this->_add_item($groupname, $graph);
00242             break;
00243 
00244             case 'text':
00245             $text = new Text();
00246             $text->parse($lexer);
00247             $lexer->parse_semicolon();
00248             $this->_add_item($groupname, $text);
00249             break;
00250 
00251             default:
00252             $lexer->parse_error('Expected group|graph|text');
00253             break;
00254             }
00255 
00256             $token = $lexer->next_token();
00257         } while (!$lexer->is_eof());
00258 
00259         if (isset($symon['layout_debug'])) {
00260             $this->_display();
00261         }
00262     }
00263 
00264     function render() {
00265         $LinkNames = array(
00266             _TITLE('CPU Load'),
00267             _TITLE('Temperature'),
00268             _TITLE('Fan'),
00269             _TITLE('Memory Usage'),
00270             _TITLE('Disk I/O'),
00271             _TITLE('Partitions Usages'),
00272             _TITLE('Loopback Interface'),
00273             _TITLE('Internal Interface'),
00274             _TITLE('External Interface'),
00275             _TITLE('State Statistics'),
00276             _TITLE('State Searches vs Packets'),
00277             _TITLE('Data Transfer'),
00278             _TITLE('Mbuf Statistics'),
00279             _TITLE('Network Protocol Usage'),
00280             _TITLE('Number of Processes'),
00281             _TITLE('Process CPU Load'),
00282         );
00283 
00284         reset($this->groups);
00285         if (is_array($this->groups)) {
00286             foreach($this->groups as $group => $items) {
00287                 if (array_key_exists($group, $LinkNames)) {
00288                     $LinkName= $LinkNames[$group];
00289                 }
00290                 else {
00291                     $LinkName= $group;
00292                 }
00293 
00294                 print ' <div class="group">
00295                             <h3 class="header"><a name="'. $group . '">' . _($LinkName) . '</a></h3>
00296                         </div>';
00297                 reset($items);
00298                 foreach($items as $item) {
00299                     $item->render();
00300                 }
00301                 print '<div class="item-footer"></div>';
00302             }
00303         }
00304     }
00305 
00306     function getgrouptitles() {
00307         $a = array();
00308         if (is_array($this->groups)) {
00309             reset($this->groups);
00310             foreach($this->groups as $group => $value) {
00311             array_push($a, $group);
00312             }
00313         }
00314         return $a;
00315     }
00316 
00317     function _display() {
00318         print "<pre>";
00319         if (is_array($this->groups)) {
00320             reset($this->groups);
00321             foreach($this->groups as $group => $items) {
00322             print "\xa\xa group ";
00323             $vars = $this->groupvars[$group]->tostring();
00324             if (strlen($vars) > 0) {
00325                 print $vars;
00326             }
00327             print ";";
00328             foreach ($items as $key => $value) {
00329                 print $value->_display();
00330             }
00331             }
00332         }
00333         print "</pre>";
00334     }
00335 
00336     function _test() {
00337         print "\xa layout definition:";
00338         $this->_display();
00339         print "\xa\xa render layout:";
00340         $this->render();
00341     }
00342 }
